profile.name: Vo Hoang Minh Tri
profile.title: AI Researcher
profile.tagline: Building intelligent vision systems and NLP solutions
profile.bio: I graduated with a degree in Data Science at Industrial University of Ho Chi Minh City with a passion for computer vision and natural language processing. Runner-up at ZALO AI Challenge 2025, I specialize in developing robust tracking systems, medical image analysis, and generative AI applications. My work spans from drone-based aerial tracking to breast cancer detection using deep learning.

projects.title: Robust Aerial Target Tracking
projects.summary: Runner-up solution at ZALO AI Challenge 2025 for drone-based aerial target tracking with high accuracy and stability.
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive aerial tracking system using YOLOE with v8m backbone. Implemented background removal preprocessing, Re-prompting and Constant-Velocity Fill Method for stable predictions, and deployed on drone hardware via Docker.

projects.title: Breast Cancer Detection from Mammography
projects.summary: Deep learning system for breast cancer detection combining ConvNeXt and KAN architectures on mammography images.
projects.description: Built a medical imaging pipeline using YOLOX for ROI extraction from mammography data. Developed ConvNeXtKAN, a novel architecture combining ConvNeXt and Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks, and evaluated on multiple mammography datasets.
projects.outcomes: Novel ConvNeXtKAN architecture for medical imaging

projects.title: Person Re-Identification System
projects.summary: Multi-camera person tracking and re-identification using YOLOv8 and OSNet for cross-camera matching.
projects.description: Implemented end-to-end person re-identification pipeline: YOLOv8-pose for person detection, YOLOv8 for tracking, and OSNet for extracting multi-scale features with low computational cost for cross-camera accuracy.

projects.title: Image Watermark Remover
projects.summary: Pix2Pix-based deep learning model for automatic watermark removal from images.
projects.description: Developed data processing pipeline for resizing and segmenting images for training. Implemented Pix2Pix GAN architecture using PyTorch for watermark removal with OpenCV-based image processing.

projects.title: English Speaking Evaluation System
projects.summary: AI-powered pronunciation assessment tool using Whisper for speech recognition with Flask API.
projects.description: Built speech-to-text pipeline using Whisper-tiny model. Developed pronunciation assessment metrics and deployed as REST API using Flask with JWT authentication and Swagger documentation.

projects.title: Banner Generative AI (ZALO AI 2023)
projects.summary: Text-to-image banner generation using Stable Diffusion with Vietnamese language support.
projects.description: Implemented Vietnamese-to-English translation using vinai-translate model. Fine-tuned Stable Diffusion for banner generation. Used LLM for keyword extraction to enhance prompt understanding and model learning.
